title: 'Buffy' actor Nicholas Brendon arrested in upstate New York
text: > Entertainment 'Buffy' actor Nicholas Brendon arrested in upstate New York This Sept. 30, 2015, booking photo provided by the Saratoga Springs Police Department shows Nicholas Brendon, who was arrested Wednesday, Sept. 30, after a fight with his girlfriend. Police say the actor known for his role in the television series “Buffy the Vampire Slayer,” is facing charges of felony third-degree robbery, misdemeanor obstruction of breathing and two criminal mischief counts. (Saratoga Springs Police Department via AP)
